minimumLength.description: Minimum length of the password policy that you have set.

requireLowercase.description: Whether you have required users to use at least one lowercase letter in their password.

requireNumbers.description: Whether you have required users to use at least one number in their password.

requireSymbols.description: Whether you have required users to use at least one symbol in their password.

requireUppercase.description: Whether you have required users to use at least one uppercase letter in their password.

temporaryPasswordValidityDays.description: In the password policy you have set, refers to the number of days a temporary password is valid. If the user does not sign-in during this time, their password will need to be reset by an administrator.
